definition[0]: to breathe air in a noisy way out through your nose, especially to show that you are annoyed or amused
example[1]: The horse snorted and stamped its hoof impatiently.
definition[1]: to take drugs by breathing them in through your nose
definition[2]: a loud sound made by breathing out through your nose, especially to show that you are annoyed or amused
example[5]: There were snorts of laughter from the audience.
definition[3]: a small amount of a drug that is breathed in through the nose
